SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &ISBUILD_OVER#="FALSE" : SET &BUILD_STATUS# = ''
! initial WAIT in seconds : IF &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_WAIT# > 0 !: SET &INIT_WAIT_TIME# = MULT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_WAIT#, 60) : WAIT &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_WAIT# : ENDIF
! Check the build status : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_BUILD_STATUS : P "Openshift intermediate build status [&BUILD_STATUS#]"
:IF &ISBUILD_OVER# EQ "FALSE"
:SWITCH &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RETRY_COUNT# !Retry infinitly till builds gets over with any of the following statuses : Complete ,Error, Failed, Cancelled : CASE -1 : SET &COUNT# = 1 : WHILE &ISBUILD_OVER# EQ "FALSE" : P "Retrying &COUNT# time(s)" ! Check the build status : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_BUILD_STATUS : P "Openshift intermediate build status [&BUILD_STATUS#]" : WAIT &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RETRY_INTERVAL# : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ENDWHILE ! No retrying : CASE 0 : P "No retrying"
! Specific number of retry : OTHER : SET &COUNT# = 1 : WHILE &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RETRY_COUNT# GE &COUNT# : P "Retrying &COUNT# time(s)" ! Check the build status : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_BUILD_STATUS : P "Openshift intermediate build status [&BUILD_STATUS#]" : IF &ISBUILD_OVER# EQ "TRUE" : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RETRY_COUNT# = 0 : ELSE ! waiting : WAIT &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RETRY_INTERVAL# : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ENDIF : ENDWHILE
:ENDSWITCH
:ENDIF : P " Final Build Status &BUILD_STATUS#" : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS# = &BUILD_STATUS# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS#,,"WORKFLOW"
